00031     <script type="text/javascript">
00032       function getContent() {
00033         var iframe = document.getElementsByTagName("iframe")[0];
00034         var body = document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0];
00035         var msg = document.createElement("div");
00036         msg.appendChild(document.createTextNode("Content Document: " + iframe.contentDocument));
00037         body.appendChild(msg);
00038         msg = document.createElement("div");
00039         msg.appendChild(document.createTextNode
00040           ("Stylesheets: " + iframe.contentDocument.styleSheets));
00041         body.appendChild(msg);
00042         msg = document.createElement("div");
00043         msg.appendChild(document.createTextNode
00044           ("Rule #1: " + iframe.contentDocument.styleSheets[iframe.contentDocument.styleSheets.length - 1].cssRules[0].cssText + " / " + document.styleSheets[document.styleSheets.length - 1].cssRules[0].cssText));
00045         body.appendChild(msg);
00046         iframe.contentDocument.styleSheets[iframe.contentDocument.styleSheets.length] =
00047           document.styleSheets[document.styleSheets.length - 1];
00048         msg = document.createElement("div");
00049         msg.appendChild(document.createTextNode
00050           ("Rule #1: " + iframe.contentDocument.styleSheets[iframe.contentDocument.styleSheets.length - 1].cssRules[0].cssText + " / " + document.styleSheets[document.styleSheets.length - 1].cssRules[0].cssText));
00051         body.appendChild(msg);
00052         
00053         var link = document.createElement("link");
00054         link.setAttribute("rel", "stylesheet");
00055         link.setAttribute("type", "text/css");
00056         link.setAttribute("href", "javascript_test.css");
00057         iframe.contentDocument.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(link);
00058       }
00059     </script>
00060     <?php } ?>
00061   </head>
